content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/encode/starlette.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.11

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the current directory contents into the container at /app
COPY . /app/

# Install any needed packages specified in requirements.txt
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Install the project’s dependencies using the provided shell script
RUN scripts/install

# Run the test suite to verify the setup
RUN scripts/test
